meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a clan or close-knit group.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors gathered clannishly every weekend for their barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The family members always stuck together clannishly during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The cats in the neighborhood seemed to act clannishly, forming a secret society.
meanings.sent4: The vines in the garden grew clannishly, intertwining and supporting each other.
meanings.sent5: The students worked clannishly on the group project, helping each other succeed.

meanings.definition: Showing strong loyalty or exclusivity to one's own group.
meanings.sent1: She had a clannishly devoted group of friends who never left her side.
meanings.sent2: The team members behaved clannishly, always supporting each other in competitions.
meanings.sent3: The clannishly protective mother bear kept her cubs close at all times.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a clannishly sturdy foundation, standing strong for generations.
meanings.sent5: The employees formed a clannishly united front against unfair treatment at work.
